name: Dark Maint
description:
Dark Maint is an atmospheric space-horror game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2. You, a young server technician, are the sole survivor of a terrible incident aboard a research space station. Use your trusty drone to explore the station and find a way to the escape pods - your only chance to leave the station alive.
But is the dreaded monstrosity that killed the other crew members still aboard? Will you be able to sneak your way through dark hallways and maintenance shafts without falling prey to the murderous creature that still might lurk in the shadows?

Controls:
WASD - Move
Shift - Sprint
CTRL - Crouch
E - Switch to drone (Works only at the orange terminal/computer)
Escape - Switch back from the Drone to the player
M - Map (Only the Player can use the Map)

DISCLAIMER:
This game was developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2. Expect bugs and missing content like in most game jam submissions

KNOWN BUGS:
- Drone can glitch through walls
- Monster can occasionally stop it's chase
- The sound setting in the main menu might not work  as intended

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Download "Dark Maint.rar"
2. Unzip "Dark Maint.rar" (Winzip, 7Zip, etc.)
3. Open "Build" folder
4. Execute Dark "Maint.exe"

Team:
Nostr0 - Programming, Map Design
Wabooti - Art

Credits:

2D Assets - SS3D, Yogstation
3D Assets - Elbolilloduro, ionward, SS3D
Sounds - Yogstation/Beestation
Menu Music - SolusLunes
